entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonOptional attribute for properties that may or may not be present when serialized/deserialized. #74285
  • reference binding to null pointer caught by ubsan #74284
    7.0.0
  • Test failures with COMPlus_JitStackChecks=1 #74280
    7.0.0
  • Announcement: Extending API review process #74273
  • [CET Debugging] User mode APC's on Windows x64 with CET enabled can cause a debug session to crash #74271
    8.0.0
  • Ensure Vector64/128/256 are blocked for pass-by-value to P/Invoke in all scenarios #74269
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_34170/Runtime_34170/Runtime_34170.sh #74260
    7.0.0
  • dnSpy: Assertion failed '(varDsc->TypeGet() == TYP_I_IMPL) && lcl->TypeIs(TYP_BYREF)' #74259
    8.0.0
  • IntPtr and int/long assignment compatibility #74258
    Future
  • [R2R] Debug assert failing for condition that is definitely true #74253
  • Is it possible to create a x509Certificate2 with the CA, client.cert and client.key? #74250
    Future
  • [tvOS] XmlSerializerTests failing #74247
  • [iOS][MacCatalyst] iOS.Simulator.XmlSerializer_Deserialize.Test failing #74245
  • [tvOS] System.Diagnostics.TraceSource.Config.Tests failing #74244
  • TarFile.ExtractToDirectoryInternal() doesn't work sometimes with compressed archives #74242
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Generate d.ts file from JSExport attributes #74233
  • When will .NET support RFC 7232? #74232
  • `dotnet build --help` is slower than .NET6 #74227
  • Mono does not align Int128 types on correct boundaries when p/invoking or passing pointers to them to unmanaged code #74223
  • Assertion failed 'block->bbWeight == BB_ZERO_WEIGHT' in 'Castle.DynamicProxy.Contributors.ProxyInstanceContributor:ImplementProxyTargetAccessor(Castle.DynamicProxy.Generators.Emitters.ClassEmitter,Castle.DynamicProxy.Generators.Emitters.SimpleAST.FieldReference):this' during 'Invert loops' #74218
    7.0.0
  • Tar: behavior for symbolic links to directories #74214
    7.0.0
  • ABI for Int128 and UInt128 is incorrect with regards to native ABI for by value parameter passing #74209
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\valuetypes\\nullable\\castclass\\null\\castclass-null019\\castclass-null019.cmd #74206
    7.0.0
  • Consider enabling R2R when loading from a byte array on OSX #74203
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Regex different behavior on .NET 6 and 7 #74266
    7.0.0
  • `[U]Int128` alignment handling is in the wrong place #72206
    7.0.0
  • Is runtime.linux-x64.Microsoft.NETCore.Runtime.ObjWriter necessary for source-build? #69611
    7.0.0
  • Rename 'easy' to 'good first issue' #74272
  • Broken system with Ubuntu 22.04 where Microsoft packages are partially replaced by Canonical packages #73764
  • Directory.CreateDirectory with UnixFileMode: behavior for missing parents #73899
    7.0.0
  • Examine uses of FP Zero for correctness #6055
    Future
  • Merge bounds check nodes #9808
    Future
  • JIT: Implement or eliminate GTF_REG_BIRTH #10418
    Future
  • Assertion failed '!comp->opts.compJitEarlyExpandMDArrays' in 'AA:Static2():System.Byte[,]' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #74128
    7.0.0
  • Prefer Span<T>.Clear() over Span<T>.Fill(default) #33813
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Logging filter for exception #74249
  • API proposal: Logging filter for exception #74248
  • Logging filter for exception type #36133
    Future
  • cannot validate certificate for 192.168.1.200 because it doesn't contain any IP SANs #74161
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.Json (U)Int128 related APIs #74139
    7.0.0
  • NegotiateAuthenticationKerberosTest failing on Android #74224
  • [API Proposal]: SelectMany simplify #74219
  • NativeAOT needs to understand SuppressTrimAnalysisWarnings #73926
    7.0.0
  • Avoid pinning OverlappedData objects #74212
  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] ObjectStackAllocationTests is failing with `COMPlus_JitStress=8`. #57910
    8.0.0
  • Is it possible to add a method that kills the process tree? #74198
  • Dataflow analysis lockup compiling System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests #73048
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Json_ToStream<MyEventsListerViewModel> #66464

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix per-call stack checks on x86 #74283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add guards around memcmp and memset to fix ubsan runtime errors. #74282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve performance of Tar library #74281
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Disable Int128 use in by value ABI scenarios, and fix field layout behavior #74279
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Directory.CreateDirectory: create missing parents using default UnixFileMode. #74277
    area-System.IO
  • Do not create `ADDR(HWI/SIMD)` in the inliner #74276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify some `ADDR`-related code; fix one bug #74274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Clean up EH routines #74270
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable JIT/Methodical/Coverage/copy_prop_byref_to_native_int on all configs #74265
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Disable failing runtime extra platforms tests #74264
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Unwrap exception when calling entrypoint #74263
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update Xunit to 2.4.2 #74262
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix leak caused by not disposing the scoped parent service provider #74261
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 7.0.0
  • Add functional custom JsonConverter tests for Int128/UInt128/Half #74254
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] Mark `Unsafe.AsRef<T>(in T)` as `scoped`. #74252
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Remove AES and SubtleCrypto from WASM #74246
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [WASM] Fix deadlock when instantiating pthread worker pool #74243
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [WASM] Fix deadlock when instantiating pthread worker pool #74240
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add runs for release/7.0* on community architectures #74239
    area-Infrastructure
  • Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74237
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Omit the JS sync context if threads are not enabled #74236
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm] Unwrap exception when calling entrypoint #74235
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Reduce allocation when options are passed to fetch #74230
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions #74226
    area-System.Transactions
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Add new javascript API types #74222
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Don't NativeAOT crossgen on ARM64 #74221
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add a way to suppress all trimming warnings #74220
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Don't track current field of state machines #74216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for indefinite length arrays #74215
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Update arcade to 7.0.0-beta.22418.4 #74210
    area-codeflow
  • Fix to skip adding self as next unrelated code list #74208
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74205
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Fix R2RDump in the presence of composite images #73979
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Convert more jit phases to opt into common post phase checks #74041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Disable Int128 use in by value ABI scenarios, and fix field layout behavior #74123
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix mirroring to internal repo clone. #74278
    blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Omit the JS sync context if threads are not enabled #74167
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Directory.CreateDirectory: create missing parents using default UnixFileMode. #74002
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Downgrade System.Reflection.Metadata in HostModel #74231
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [workloads] Shorten the workload name even more #74176
  • Clean up a TODO for ChainPolicyTests #74251
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Disable failing runtime extra platforms tests #74143
  • Dependency graph viewer README #74177
    documentation
  • [release/6.0] Bump arcade to 6.0.0-beta.22418.3 #74193
    blocking-release, area-codeflow
  • JIT: one-sided inference from unrelated predicates #72979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Try to make tooling happier. #74196
    area-System.Security
  • Remove AES and SubtleCrypto from WASM #74165
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • #52851 skip CurrentDirectorySet on MacCatalyst #74228
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • [Ppc64le] bug fixes #74131
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [Ppc64le] bug fixes #74058
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] Reduce allocation when options are passed to fetch #74142
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Add new javascript API types #74166
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Don't NativeAOT crossgen on ARM64 #74211
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add a way to suppress all trimming warnings #74137
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix ObjectStackAllocationTests JitStress failure #74174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump timout in NativeAOT extra-platforms #74202
  • Don't track current field of state machines #74111
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Improve ControlledExecution tests #74186
    area-System.Runtime
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74045
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix one more Crossgen2 field layout mismatch with runtime #73978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Allow more than 64 ISA flags for jit interface. #73965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Simplify platform macro definitions in PAL #73530
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use the scoped keyword in LibraryImportGenerator #73479
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Improve JitDisasm for top-level statements, expose DumpJittedMethods in Release #74090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix for Random failures in System.Numerics.Tests.modpowTest.ModPowAxiom test #74181
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0-rc1] net7.0 + net6.0 workload multitargeting changes #74018
    blocking-release, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Backport crossgen2 fix for musl-libc #73986
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode/IsEnum intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Disable matching constants for vectors that needs upper half to be save/restore #74192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Don't try to build PGO tools on platforms with no CoreCLR port. #74147
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, arch-s390x, arch-ppc64le
  • Adding zmmStateSupport and AVX512F, AVX512CD, AVX512BW, AVX512DQ and AVX512VL ISAs. #74113
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • update Helix arm64 images #73963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix loading of R2R assemblies from byte arrays/streams #74118
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • try to port ASCIIUtility.WidenAsciiToUtf16 to x-plat intrinsics #73055
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [wasm] Use new javascript API in tests and samples #74153
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Unix]: AcceptAsync with existing AcceptSocket support on Unix #73499
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Allow SIMD-returning calls as arguments #74184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] SIMD support improvements #73289
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [release/6.0] Add Rocky Linux RIDs (#74159) #74164
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] App does not Run as a service in a Windows Container #74188
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 6.0.x
  • Hash the AssertionDsc struct for faster lookup #72700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
